g.text: Research, build, and scale AI-powered mobile apps across App Store & Google Play

svg.text: WHAT WE MASTER WITH EVERY APP WE SHIP

g.text: We don't just advise clients — we've scaled our own products.
Real monetization experience means we build revenue-first products for clients
UA expertise transfers directly to client performance marketing campaigns
Product thinking (retention, engagement loops) shapes better client architectures
Every app we ship makes our agency sharper.
Every app is a live data laboratory feeding our AI platform.
Real user behavior data across categories trains more generalized AI models
GA4 event structures from our apps become templates for the SaaS platform
Monetization experiments reveal the right questions a SaaS analytics tool must ask
First-party data is the ultimate competitive moat.
